alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Parker; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 7:16AM CST until March 01 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Johnson County in north central Texas... Southeastern Parker County in north central Texas... Southwestern Tarrant County in north central Texas... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 716 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Godley, or 11 miles west of Joshua, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Burleson, Cleburne, Keene, Joshua, Godley, Cresson and Benbrook Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
